## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d39be5b0410d070664968fbabf4d39171cfb952834b8f912315ec16704fa5405)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'irasim' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
